key.name: id
key.description: The ID of the applet. For example menu, taskbar, systemtray etc..

key.name: panel
key.description: The identifier of the panel which contains this applet.

key.name: position
key.description: The position of this applet on panel.

key.name: panel-right-stick
key.description: If true, the position of the applet is interpreted relative to the right (or bottom if vertical) edge of the panel.
